note.p: Death: Annandale Grange Gardens, Eastbourne (14 September 1889)
Education: St John's College, Cambridge (for 3 terms); Peterhouse, Cambridge. BA (1841), MA (1844). Studied medicine at Guy's Hospital, and at University College, London. MD (1851, Cambridge)
Career: Fellow of Peterhouse, Cambridge (1841-1860); Physician at Harrogate, then at Halifax; improved scientifi instruments
Memberships: MRCP (1860); FCPS; FRAS (1869); MRCP (Retired Physician)
